Sentencas: Atmospheric plasma spraying technologies have been used to produce coatings for different applications in energy systems as gas turbines and solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems

Sentencas: Thermal barrier coatings (TBCs) are widely used in gas turbines to protect structural parts from the combustion gases.
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems

Sentencas: Although they are in use since several decades there is still a large amount of research focused on a further improvement going on.
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems

Sentencas: Especially increased temperature capability, improved microstructures or optimized optical properties of the coatings will be described in the present paper.
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems

Sentencas: Atmospheric plasma spraying (APS) technology has also been used to manufacture different coatings for solid oxide fuel cell systems.
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems

Sentencas: These coatings include NiO/YSZ coatings for anodes, YSZ coatings for electrolytes and different functional coatings as Cr-evaporation layer on interconnects.
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems

Sentencas: Recent results on these different kinds of coatings will be shown.
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems

Sentencas: Performance data of SOFCs on metallic porous substrates will also be given.
Titulo: Advanced thermal spray technologies for applications in energy systems
